story.iWant: an attractive landing page explaining ArgusAI
story.soThat: I can quickly understand if it meets my needs

tasks.task: Enhance hero section with actual screenshot (AC: 1, 2)
Refine feature section with 5 key features (AC: 3)

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: Given I visit the GitHub Pages URL, when the landing page loads, then I see the project name and tagline
Given I visit the GitHub Pages URL, when the landing page loads, then I see a hero image or screenshot
Given I visit the GitHub Pages URL, when I view features, then I see 3-5 key feature bullet points
Given I visit the GitHub Pages URL, when I want to start, then I see a "Get Started" button linking to installation docs
Given I'm on mobile, when I view the landing page, then it's responsive and readable

tests.standards: Docusaurus site testing is primarily visual/manual. Build verification with `npm run build`. Use browser DevTools for responsive testing at 375px, 414px, 768px, 1024px, 1920px. Check Lighthouse for performance, accessibility, and SEO scores. Verify all links work with manual navigation.

locations.location: docs-site/ (npm run build for build verification)

ideas.idea: Verify title "ArgusAI" and tagline "AI-Powered Home Security" appear in hero
Verify hero section contains screenshot or hero image with appropriate alt text
Count feature cards - should be 3-5 distinct features with icons
Click "Get Started" button - verify it navigates to /docs/intro
Test at 375px width - verify no horizontal scroll, readable text, no overlapping elements

existingImplementation.summary: P9-6.2 created a complete Docusaurus site with landing page that already has: - Hero section with project name "ArgusAI" and tagline "AI-Powered Home Security" - "Get Started" button linking to /docs/intro - "View on GitHub" secondary button - 3 feature cards: AI-Powered Analysis, UniFi Protect Integration, Smart Home Ready - Highlights section with key features and supported cameras - Footer with links to docs, community, and GitHub - Responsive design with mobile breakpoints
